headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  GOLDBERG, RICHARD STEWART

snippet: GOLDBERG--Richard Stewart, MD, Age 70. Passed away peacefully on March 29th after a valiant battle with cancer. Survived by his wife, Sabrina; and children Alexander, Nicholas, Sheila. Dickie lived life with passion, rhythm and determination, inspiring all who knew and loved him. Donations in his honor can be made to Bellevue Hospice Haven. For information contact J. Foster Phillips Funeral Home: 718-526-5656. 1/3
lead_paragraph: GOLDBERG--Richard Stewart, MD, Age 70. Passed away peacefully on March 29th after a valiant battle with cancer. Survived by his wife, Sabrina; and children Alexander, Nicholas, Sheila. Dickie lived life with passion, rhythm and determination, inspiring all who knew and loved him. Donations in his honor can be made to Bellevue Hospice Haven. For information contact J. Foster Phillips Funeral Home: 718-526-5656. 1/3
